verses.text: \w Among|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* members \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* Antioch \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* several \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w teachers|strong="G1320"\w* – Barnabas, \w Simeon|strong="G4826"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* known \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w name|strong="G2564"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* ‘Black’, \w Lucius|strong="G3066"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cyrene|strong="G2956"\w*, \w Manaen|strong="G3127"\w*, foster-brother \w of|strong="G2532"\w* Prince \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w*.

\w While|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w engaged|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* worship \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w fasting|strong="G3522"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Set|strong="G2532"\w* apart \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* Barnabas \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w*, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.”

Accordingly, \w after|strong="G2532"\w* \w fasting|strong="G3522"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4336"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w placed|strong="G2007"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w on|strong="G5495"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* dismissed \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

Barnabas \w and|strong="G5037"\w* Saul, \w sent|strong="G1599"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* mission, \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w*, \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w went|strong="G2718"\w* \w down|strong="G2718"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Seleucia|strong="G4581"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w there|strong="G1564"\w* sailed \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Cyprus|strong="G2954"\w*.

\w On|strong="G1722"\w* \w reaching|strong="G1161"\w* \w Salamis|strong="G4529"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w began|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* tell \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w message|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2453"\w* \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w an|strong="G2192"\w* assistant.

\w After|strong="G1161"\w* \w passing|strong="G1330"\w* \w through|strong="G1330"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w island|strong="G3520"\w*, \w they|strong="G1161"\w* reached \w Paphos|strong="G3974"\w*, \w where|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w an|strong="G2147"\w* astrologer \w who|strong="G3739"\w* pretended \w to|strong="G5100"\w* \w be|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G2147"\w* \w prophet|strong="G5578"\w* – \w a|strong="G2147"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w by|strong="G3739"\w* birth, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* Barjoshua.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w at|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* court \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Governor, \w Sergius|strong="G4588"\w* \w Paulus|strong="G3972"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w intelligence|strong="G4908"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w sent|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* Barnabas \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* asked \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* told \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w message|strong="G3056"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Elymas|strong="G1681"\w*, \w the|strong="G1161"\w* astrologer (\w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* meaning \w of|strong="G3686"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w word|strong="G3588"\w*), opposed \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, eager \w to|strong="G2212"\w* divert \w the|strong="G1161"\w* Governor’s attention \w from|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w However|strong="G1161"\w*, \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w* (\w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w same|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*), \w full|strong="G4130"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, fixed \w his|strong="G1519"\w* eyes \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G1161"\w*,

“\w You|strong="G3004"\w* incarnation \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w deceit|strong="G1388"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w fraud|strong="G4468"\w*! \w You|strong="G3004"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*! \w You|strong="G3004"\w* opponent \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w good|strong="G3956"\w*! \w Will|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w never|strong="G3756"\w* \w cease|strong="G3973"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* divert \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w straight|strong="G2117"\w* \w paths|strong="G3598"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*? Listen!

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unable|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*.” \w Immediately|strong="G3916"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* mist \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2532"\w* feeling \w about|strong="G1909"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* someone \w to|strong="G2532"\w* guide \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* Governor \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w happened|strong="G1096"\w*, \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* believer \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w Christ|strong="G2962"\w*, \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w greatly|strong="G4100"\w* impressed \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1322"\w* \w about|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w rose|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w motioning|strong="G2678"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: “\w People|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2475"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G2532"\w* here \w who|strong="G3588"\w* worship \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, hear \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w chose|strong="G1586"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w ancestors|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w during|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w stay|strong="G3940"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* Egypt increased \w the|strong="G1722"\w* prosperity \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w uplifted|strong="G5308"\w* \w arm|strong="G1023"\w* \w brought|strong="G1806"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w For|strong="G2532"\w* \w about|strong="G5613"\w* \w four|strong="G5071"\w* \w hundred|strong="G5071"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fifty|strong="G4004"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*. \w In|strong="G2532"\w* \w later|strong="G3326"\w* times \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G1325"\w* \w Judges|strong="G2923"\w*, \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w whom|strong="G3778"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w Samuel|strong="G4545"\w* \w was|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w last|strong="G3778"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* demanded \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4549"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Kish|strong="G2797"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* Benjamin, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* reigned \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*.

\w After|strong="G2596"\w* removing \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* throne, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bore|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* – ‘\w In|strong="G1519"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* son \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesse|strong="G2421"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3956"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* \w my|strong="G3956"\w* own \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w* \w carry|strong="G4160"\w* \w out|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w my|strong="G3956"\w* purposes.’

\w It|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G2596"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*’s \w descendants|strong="G4690"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w accordance|strong="G2596"\w* \w with|strong="G2316"\w* \w his|strong="G2596"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*, \w gave|strong="G3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w a|strong="G2596"\w* \w Savior|strong="G4990"\w* – \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*;

\w John|strong="G2491"\w* having \w first|strong="G3588"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="G4296"\w*, \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w appearance|strong="G4383"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* Jesus, \w a|strong="G4383"\w* baptism \w on|strong="G3588"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w* \w for|strong="G3956"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*.

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* drawing towards \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w end|strong="G3089"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w his|strong="G3708"\w* career, \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* ‘\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w suppose|strong="G5101"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w*? \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5613"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* “\w one|strong="G3739"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w*” \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w sandal|strong="G5266"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* worthy \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w untie|strong="G3089"\w*.’

Brothers \w and|strong="G2532"\w* sisters, \w descendants|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* Abraham, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* worship \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w us|strong="G2249"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w message|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w sent|strong="G1821"\w*.

\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* leaders, failing \w to|strong="G2532"\w* recognize \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G2532"\w* understanding \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w utterances|strong="G5456"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* read \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*, \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w condemning|strong="G2919"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.
